# Grettings

## I'm here

### Alo
```{python}
import altair as alt
from vega_datasets import data

cars = data.cars()
print(cars.head())
```

## segundo punto

```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point().encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon",
    y="Horsepower",
    tooltip=["Name","Origin","Miles_per_Gallon","Horsepower"]
).interactive()
```


## Scatter plot with color 


```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point(filled=True).encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon",
    y="Horsepower",
    color="Origin",
    tooltip=["Name", "Origin", "Miles_per_Gallon", "Horsepower"]
).interactive()
```
